tweet: The Palazzo San Giorgio is a palace in Genoa, Italy. It is situated in the Piazza Caricamento. The palace was built in 1260 by Guglielmo Boccanegra, uncle of Simone Boccanegra, the first Doge of Genoa (ruler of the Republic of Genoa). #Palace #SanGiorgio #Genoa #Italy  https://t.co/j3YDREMa6V
